website_summaries.verdict: With a new low price, the 2DS offers a huge array of compelling games and makes for a great entry-level system for uninitiated first-time gamers.
pros: The Nintendo 2DS is the most affordable portable system for a younger gamer or for those not interested in 3D visuals
It packs in a 4GB SD card and gives players access to the 3DS' impressive library of cartridge-based and downloadable games
Best of all, it comes with a free download code for Mario Kart 7
cons: The 2DS feels cheap and has only one speaker, which sounds a little lacking
Though it's designed for children, there are a few vulnerable spots on the 2DS, and it might not survive a bad fall
By today's standards, its screens feel too small

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: the 2ds with pokemon Y.....the package fro this item was used and the item is broken screen I want my refund immediately this disapppointed my child on christmas morning it was the only thing he wanted for christmas and this ruined his christmas, My only satisfaction would come from a refund and a new 2ds for making my child have a horrible christmas.Horrible Horrible, I tried contacting the seller and have had no success at it.
customer_reviews.author: laureen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect to much
customer_reviews.text: When i got sent it to my house i was happy, but after further inspection i noticed a half inch screen crack, it isn’t that big of the deal so i got ready to play pokemon Y but there was no sd card so i’m not sure if one is supposed to come with it or not so i just ordered it, im not sure if my pokemon Y works yet we’ll see though.
customer_reviews.author: Braydin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Son loved his so much we had to get get one for our daughter.
customer_reviews.author: patti shultz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game console and awesome game
customer_reviews.text: So happy I got this. Not being able to close it can be a pain on the hand, but you get used to it. Also Pokemon Y, oh my goodness. I hadn't played a Pokemon game in like 10 years almost and I was so glad it was Y. Fun, lots of new interactions, and wonderful story.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Russell

customer_reviews.title: Issue's with the console
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with a charger or the game pre-installed. It was a gift for my little brothers birthday and it wasn't very satisfying to say the least.

customer_reviews.title: An Underrated Little Handheld
customer_reviews.text: Love the game, love the unfairly maligned 2 DS. I needed American hardware since my Japanese handheld was region locked. For the price, this was a perfect solution.

customer_reviews.text: really great and affortable for anyone wanting to play the new pokemon versions for a cheap prize. the screen is smaller than the new 3ds but for the price its worth it

customer_reviews.title: ... the wear and tear of a child a bit better than the flip action of the 3ds
customer_reviews.text: Handles the wear and tear of a child a bit better than the flip action of the 3ds. Like many electronics with the "headphone jack" style charging system, wears out fast with children.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend and he loves it

customer_reviews.title: Product was marked New but it's refurbished which is Like New. The home button is slightly askew and ...
customer_reviews.text: Left side panel is loose, probably because somebody dropped it. Product was marked New but it's refurbished which is Like New. The home button is slightly askew and bothers me a lot more than it should.

customer_reviews.title: I received the 2 Ds but not the game, ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the 2 Ds but not the game, no code, no cartridge, and no it was not already installed

customer_reviews.author: Maria Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect  little system
customer_reviews.text: Great system for the younger set (say 7 to 12 or so). My daughter loves the built in pokemon game. And the other included apps have been a hit as well, even after a few months. The camera and picture editor in particular. Don't know about longevity yet so we'll have to wait and see how well the thing holds up.
customer_reviews.author: D. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 systems for Christmas for my boys and they were great! The kids love the game system and I am glad it was 3d.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thompson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bought the sea green-ish one, automatically placed a order of blue one.
customer_reviews.author: Hanfei Zhang

customer_reviews.title: No sounds, waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I thought the deal was too good to be true and it was. I was sent something without sound. It wouldn’t charge correctly and it looked very used. There is no way that this product was “checked 4 times right before it was sent out”. I don’t believe it and the guy who told me that sounded like he was on autopilot. I thought to myself hmm, they probably sent this in hopes I’d just give up when I find out there’s no sound, and they win. Then I checked reviews and saw another review that said “you guys are sending defective products on purpose”. Hmm
customer_reviews.author: Swingbeatnik7 l

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Great gift that went over really well with the twenty-something who received it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn C. Morris

customer_reviews.title: pokemaster
customer_reviews.text: awesome this works great my son loves it even I can play it and my children play with it all day
customer_reviews.author: Diana Evans

customer_reviews.title: This same bundle is cheaper elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure about elsewhere, but Toys 'R Us has this exact same bundle ( blue 2ds with Pokemon Y ) for $149.99. Why is it over $50 more from Nintendo? I could buy both items separately and still spend $15-20 less.
customer_reviews.author: E. S. Young

product_meta.title: Nintendo 2DS Handheld Gaming System with Pokemon Y (Blue)
feature_bullets: The Nintendo 2DS system gives you all the features of the Nintendo 3DS and Nintendo 3DS XL, minus 3D viewing.
Online Nintendo Zone lets you watch game videos and find discounts
